text: Kare (ō ) wa,(fujin-tachi ni) itta. `Anata gataga yūsufu o yūwaku shita toki, kekkyoku dōdeatta no ka.' Ka no on'na-tachi wa,`arrā wa kanzen muketsu de ara remasu. Kare (yūsufu) ni wa, nani no warui koto mo nai no o zonjite imasu.' To itta. Kijin no tsuma wa itta. `Ima, shinjitsu ga (mina ni) akiraka ni narimashita. Kare o yūwaku shita no wa watashidesu. Hontōni kare wa seijitsu (kōketsu)na jinbutsudesu
